serviceMediamtx.step1Description: Quickstart Guide tells you how to start using Mediamtx on your device.
serviceMediamtx.step2Description: The Usage Guide tells you how to use the application, according to our standard model.
serviceMediamtx.step3Description: Download the Mediamtx Package and install it to your device according to the Quickstart Guide, to get using the app.
serviceMediamtxUsageCard.title: Purpose
serviceMediamtxUsageCard.content:
• Real-time tracking of friendlies (GPS).
  • Send observations to the command post (HQ) for interpretation.
  • Follow the Recon Feed
serviceMediamtxUsageView.title: Mediamtx
